DrugName: Pain-relieving medications like oxycodone or hydrocodone for pain management
An anti-nausea medication such as ondansetron in case of potential chemotherapy-induced nausea and vomiting later in the disease course
A bisphosphonate like zoledronic acid to prevent further bone lesions and manage related pain
Prostate-specific antigen (PSA) test results are needed to guide treatment decisions. If the patient has a high PSA level, then hormone therapy such as goserelin may be indicated
Consider an antidepressant medication like citalopram for managing depression
